title: Power series for e^(-2x^2) part - c

content.question: Let g be the function given by the sum of the first four nonzero terms of the power series for f(x) about x=0 . Show that |f(x)−g(x)| <0.02 for −0.6 ≤ x ≤ 0.6 .

frqParts.text: Let g be the function given by the sum of the first four nonzero terms of the power series for f(x) about x=0 . Show that |f(x)−g(x)| <0.02 for −0.6 ≤ x ≤ 0.6 .

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
